CustomField.formula: IF ( ISPICKVAL( Origine_de_la_demande__c ,"Web") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199653000/ICONS_CONTACT_Internet", "Web", 40 ,40 ) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Origine_de_la_demande__c , "Téléphone") , IMAGE("/resource/1551199676000/ICONS_CONTACT_Appel", "Phone", 40 ,40) , IF ( ISPICKVAL( Origine_de_la_demande__c , "Email") , IMAGE("/resource/1552560061000/ICONS_CONTACT_Email", "Email", 40 ,40) , "" ) ) )
CustomField.label: Icone Origine
